\documentclass[border=5pt, tikz]{standalone}

\usepackage{amsmath} % for \boxed command

\begin{document}

\usetikzlibrary{calc}

\def\unitLength{1in}
\tikzset{ every path/.append style={ line width=0.7pt
                             , rounded corners=0.1mm
                             }
        , x=\unitLength
        , y=\unitLength
        , every node/.append style={font=\sffamily}
        }


% Page size
\def\pageWidth{8.5}
\def\pageHeight{11}
\def\pageMarg{1}

% Set title
\def\blmTitle{Cerca de 100, multiplicación}


% Command to add page and copyright
\def\preparePage{
  % path with whole page
  \path (0,0) rectangle (\pageWidth,\pageHeight);

  % Coordinates for corners of printable area
  \coordinate (bottomLeft) at (\pageMarg,\pageMarg);
  \coordinate (topLeft) at (\pageMarg,\pageHeight-\pageMarg);
  \coordinate (topRight) at (\pageWidth-\pageMarg,\pageHeight-\pageMarg);
  \coordinate (bottomRight) at (\pageWidth-\pageMarg,\pageMarg);

  % add title
  \node[font=\Huge, anchor=west] (Title) at (topLeft) {\blmTitle};
  
  % Copyright text at bottom
  \node[below, align = left, anchor=west] at (\pageMarg,\pageMarg/2) {©2024 Grupo LEMA 
   (www.grupolema.org). Licencia de uso CC-BY 4.0.\\ 
    Adaptado IM K–5 Math v.I, ©2021 Illustrative Mathematics® 
    distribuido con una licencia CC BY 4.0};
}


% PAGE 1
\begin{tikzpicture}
\preparePage

\coordinate (colTopLeft) at ([yshift=-0.8in]topLeft);
\coordinate (colTopRight) at ([yshift=-0.8in]topRight);
\coordinate (colTopMid) at ($ (colTopLeft)!0.5!(colTopRight) $);
\coordinate (colTopMidPlusMargin) at ([xshift=0.4in]colTopMid);
\coordinate (bottomMid) at ($ (bottomLeft)!0.5!(bottomRight) $);

% Linea que separa las columnas
\draw (colTopMid) -- (bottomMid);

% Títulos de las columnas
\node[font={\LARGE\bfseries}, anchor=west] at (colTopLeft) {Partida 1};
\node[font=\LARGE\bfseries, anchor=west] at (colTopMidPlusMargin) {Partida 2};

% Rondas de partida 1 (columna 1)
\foreach \p in {1,...,5}{
  \node[anchor=west] at ([yshift=-{1.3*\p}in]colTopLeft) {Ronda \p \hspace{0.5in} $\boxed{\phantom{\frac{00}{00}}} \times 1 \ \boxed{\phantom{\frac{00}{00}}}= \underline{\hspace{1cm}}$};
}

% Rondas de partida 2 (columna 2)
\foreach \p in {1,...,5}{
  \node[anchor=west] at ([yshift=-{1.3*\p}in]colTopMidPlusMargin) {Ronda \p \hspace{0.5in} $\boxed{\phantom{\frac{00}{00}}} \times 2 \ \boxed{\phantom{\frac{00}{00}}}= \underline{\hspace{1cm}}$};
}


\end{tikzpicture}


\end{document}
